description: Euclid-Mullin sequence (A000945) with initial value a(1)=43 instead of a(1)=2.
links: Robert Price, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..43
mathematica: a[1]=43; a[n_] := First[ Flatten[ FactorInteger[ 1+Product[ a[ j ], {j, n-1} ] ] ] ]; Array[a, 15]
crossrefs: Agrees with A000945 from 5th term. Cf. A000946, A005265, A005266.
author: _Labos Elemer_
